thread.section_title: RushMyPassport.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RushMyPassport.com | rushmypassport.com | 3 of 151
thread.title: John Oeltjen

author: John Oeltjen
title: John Oeltjen
text:
I called as requested to be walked through the process and speak with an agent. I was on hold waiting for an agent for over 50 minutes, finished with that agent and then got transferred with a second person and waited 20 minutes. Agents were good, but frustrating to wait that long.
The renewed passport was returned complete to me much quicker than promised.
I would recommend them. Francois "Topaz" Topasna was great.
